request.description:
http://{{server}}/portal/api_engine/{engine_name}/schema/fields - Return the schema fiels for the specified engine

response.name: GET CRAWL INFO

request.description:
http://{{server}}/portal/api_engine/{engine_name}/schema - Post the schema fiels for the specified engine

Ref: https://lucene.apache.org/solr/guide/7_4/schema-api.html

response.name: GET CRAWL INFO

body.raw:
<add> 
   <doc> 
      <field name = "id">001</field> 
      <field name = "first name">Rajiv</field> 
      <field name = "last name">Reddy</field> 
      <field name = "phone">9848022337</field> 
      <field name = "city">Hyderabad</field> 
   </doc>  
   </add>

response.name: GET CRAWL INFO
